channel.title: Technology skill
channel.description:
the skill will be release
the overlay of the skill
working ages you and your crew which you can hire for 80-400gp per minute per person depending on their experience (all constructors are npcs not players) they will work hard building your fort, your fort will only be visible to you. you will advance through the ages going faster with your recruits and learning new skills and learning how to do more things lye along the path i have been working on this skill for 4 days. when you reach the top you will start gaining money and continuosly gaining money where you can hire gesters, hobos and many others to entertain you with their funy dancing wiggling and squirming. i think my skill is very nifty and will be released at 120 votes remember. if it reaches 120 votes b4 i finish then youll have to wait for me XD any ideas for my new skill post here.o yeh you will be able to take loans if you pay back at the end if you dont pay back your workers stop working and mobs start appearing in your fort over crowding it. have fun voting. ps if if the no counter goes to 25 or higher there will be no release XD

item.title: Technology skill
item.dc:creator: @welshy welshy
item.description:
@welshy wrote:

well i wouldnt pay lol but id use it when it comes out

Read full topic

item.title: Technology skill
item.dc:creator: @pookey71 Pookey71
item.description:
@pookey71 wrote:

[quote=“pookey71, post:13, topic:17171”][quote author=pookey71 link=topic=25712.msg293473#msg293473 date=1160199069]
I wouldn’t…Bloody nooby leechers…Would fuck up a good thing…Then e will have 20000 more
“ZOMG MY SERVER IS LIKE AGE OF THE EMPIRES ZOMG JOIN MY SERVER ZOMG!!!1!SHIFT!!!”
[/quote][quote author=bloodbath32 link=topic=25712.msg293483#msg293483 date=1160199238]
No, should not release, add it to QuestScape, then you’ll only have it and not others (will bring more attraction to your server) and maybe you could sell it for some moooolaaah Other than that, it would be nice to use on Latescape but still think you should keep it
[/quote][quote author=Yz85Racer link=topic=25712.msg293504#msg293504 date=1160199511]
DanieB, as much as I would love to have that skill in my server, I wouldn’t release, because, it will just be leeched, and most likely posted on other sites, but if you do release, you’ll real in a bucketload of (you know what)
[/quote]
WE all have the SMART idea…MOST of these people WILL leech…BUT selll it.ASK mopar :P[/quote]

Read full topic
